reviews.text: I had six enjoyable nights at the Devon Residence, and found it a very relaxing base to explore this largest of the 115 Seychelles Islands. Let me say, right at the outset, that I feel that having a rental car is probably a "must" for older travelers, or anyone with mobility issues. There are many buses available that cover almost all of the island of Mahe, but Devon is located up the side of a steep, curving road that is a good quarter mile from the main coastal road that pretty much circles the island. That should not be too much of a problem, as Jane, the owner, is able to arrange very reasonable car hire from a local company, which will deliver the car to the residence and also allow you to drop it off at the airport. Jane can also arrange a taxi pickup or dropoff to the airport, if desired.
